articles.author: Zack Sharf
articles.title: James Gunn Says Superman Is Not Woke, Anti-America Is Hurting Box Office - Variety
articles.description: James Gunn says a certain amount of "anti-American sentiment" is hurting "Superman" at the worldwide box office.
articles.content: James Gunn said in an interview with Entertainment Weekly that he remains somewhat confused over the conservative backlash that erupted before the release of “Superman.” Fox News and other right-wing… [+3378 chars]
